title: Table 65 - Row 6
clause_text: : Whole sale shops not being used for retail trading. | For every 3 class rooms: For every 100 sq.m. carpet area or fraction thereof. | (1) 1) 5 two wheelers for every three class rooms. The number of mini bus parking shall be at the rate of bus for every 40 numbers of students for 50% strength of students may be provided at the option of owner / developer. Mini bus parking shall be permitted on playground except during school timing.: 1 | (1) 1) 5 two wheelers for every three class rooms.
